title: ** Basic Auth Login Use Case
preconditions: User is on the Basic Auth page (<https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth>)
main_flow: User navigates to the Basic Auth page (<https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth>)
User enters the correct username "admin" in the Username field
User enters the correct password "admin" in the Password field
5. System checks the entered credentials against the expected values

6. If the entered credentials are correct, the system grants access and displays the "Congratulations! You must have the proper credentials." page with the two headers "Basic Auth" and "Congratulations!"
a. User enters incorrect username or password
b. System denies access and keeps the user on the login page with an error message "Bad Username or Password"
a. User navigates to an incorrect URL
b. System displays an error message "Page not found"
postconditions: User is authenticated and on the "Congratulations! You must have the proper credentials." page
User can interact with the elements on the page, such as click on the headers or use the browser's Back button.
